page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: A Working Mums Day In our school of 306 children 131 children's mothers go out to work. This is what one Mum does. I get up at{eight o'clock}and make the sandwiches and get the cereals or sometimes toast and a cup of coffee. Then when the children go to school I go to work. I have to be there for{9 {o'oclock}and I have one hours dinner break. I go to my friends for dinner and then I go back to David's Supermarket. I work on the meat counter. I finish work at{half past {five.}I get home about{quarter to six and I go to clubs at night. My favourite hobby is to play squash and watch a final. My other hobby is to play table-tennis. I get back about ten or eleven.
